content.rendered:
Attention: The NYU “Statistics” listserv is migrating to a blog format!

Beginning in Spring 2013, NYU Data Services will be transitioning to a blog platform to disseminate news about our tutorials, services, job opportunities, and more.

You can still receive this content via email (same as always) but in order to do so you’ll need to subscribe to our new blog.
To subscribe:
1. Visit http://nyudataservices.wordpress.com
2. Enter your email address on the left.
3. Click the blue “Subscribe” button.

Alternatively, you can add our blog’s RSS feed to your favorite RSS reader or visit the News tab on the Data Services homepage at http://library.nyu.edu/dataservices.
